nl.utwente.iapc.IAPConnect4.core.networking

Class Command

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.utwente.iapc.IAPConnect4.core.networking.Command

  • public class Command
extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Command(Protocol p)
      Constructs a new Command object with a command string and no argument strings.
      Command(Protocol p, java.lang.String arg1)
      Constructs a new Command object with a command string and one argument string.
      Command(Protocol p, java.lang.String arg1, java.lang.String arg2)
      Constructs a new Command object with a command string and two argument strings.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getArgument(int index)
      Returns the nth argument of the Command, with 0 being the command itself, subset of Protocol.values() in String form.
      java.lang.String getCommand()
      Returns the whole command in String form, for sending it over a Socket through a BufferedReader or BufferedWriter .
      static Command parse(java.lang.String command)
      Parse a String representation of a command, splitting it into a command, instanceof Protocol, and String arguments.
      java.lang.String toString()
      Debug representation of the command in String form.

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • getArgument

        public java.lang.String getArgument(int index)
        Returns the nth argument of the Command, with 0 being the command itself, subset of Protocol.values() in String form.
        Parameters:
        index - index of the requested argument.
        Returns:
        String represetation of the argument.

      • getCommand

        public java.lang.String getCommand()
        Returns the whole command in String form, for sending it over a Socket through a BufferedReader or BufferedWriter .
        Returns:
        String representation of the command, including a \r\n

      • parse

        public static Command parse(java.lang.String command)
                     throws InvalidCommandException
        Parse a String representation of a command, splitting it into a command, instanceof Protocol, and String arguments.
        Parameters:
        command - String command.
        Returns:
        instance of Command.
        Throws:
        InvalidCommandException - On null on input and on the first word not being a recognised command.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Debug representation of the command in String form. Not suitable for sending the Command over the Internet, use getCommand() instead.
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        Debug representation of a Command in String form.
